##Introduction

This repository contains my work for the course project for the Coursera course "Getting and Cleaning data", part of the Data Science specialization.

##Raw Data

The features stored in the x_test.txt. The activity labels are in the y_test.txt file. The test subjects are in the subject_test.txt file.

##Tidy Data

run_analysis.R merges the test and training data, create a tidy data set containing the means of all the columns per test subject and per activity.

##CodeBook

Code Book contains dtails of data source and dataset information.
